snippet: Federal securities regulators charged a former Detroit mayor and treasurer, along with the city’s public pension investment adviser, with devising a secret exchange of “lavish gifts” to influence the pension fund’s investments.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission charges former Detroit Mayor Kwame M Kilpatrick and city's public pension adviser MayfieldGentry Realty Advisors of devising a secret exchange of lavish gifts to influence the pension fund’s investments.
lead_paragraph: Federal securities regulators charged a former Detroit mayor and treasurer, along with the city’s public pension investment adviser, with devising a secret exchange of “lavish gifts” to influence the pension fund’s investments.

headline.main: Michigan: Ex-Mayor Is Accused in Scheme Involving Pension Fund
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Ex-Mayor Is Accused In Scheme Involving Pension Fund
